1. Steam quietly drops massive new free game, no subscription needed  GAMINGbible
  2. New early access mech extraction shooter and battle…  Inkl
  3. World of Tanks dev’s new free mech game Steel Hunters debuts to mixed response  PCGamesN
  4. Steel Hunters Early Access Review – Middle of the Food Chain  GamingBolt

item.title: Round Up: The First Impressions Of 'Drag x Drive' For Switch 2 Are In - Nintendo Life
item.description:
1. Round Up: The First Impressions Of 'Drag x Drive' For Switch 2 Are In  Nintendo Life
  2. Drag X Drive booth staff mention they’d been told to refer to them as “vehicles” and not wheelchairs  My Nintendo News
  3. Can Drag x Drive be the ARMS of the Nintendo Switch 2?  TheSixthAxis
  4. Drag X Drive is a good showcase of Switch 2's mouse controls – but lacks the variety to stand out  The Mirror

item.title: Rime developer auctioning off IPs after declaring bankruptcy - My Nintendo News
item.description:
1. Rime developer auctioning off IPs after declaring bankruptcy  My Nintendo News
  2. The rights for Tequila Works's games are up for auction after insolvency filing  Engadget
  3. Tequila's lost projects include a possible Rime follow-up, a dungeon tourguide game and a procgen fighting sim  Rock Paper Shotgun
  4. Tequila Works Auctions Off Its Brand and IPs  Wccftech
  5. Bankrupt indie developer behind Rime and Gylt selling off game rights at open auction  Eurogamer
